title: Intuit Quicken Rental Property Manager v2009
description:
Screenshot: <a href="
http://jody.hopto.org/imagehost/images/jody/intuitquickenrentalpropertymanagerv2009.jpg" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://jody.hopto.org/imagehost/images/jody/intuitquickenrentalpropertymanagerv2009.jpg</a>

Info:
Quicken Rental Property Manager 2.0 offers the easiest way to organize your rental property income, expense and tenant information all in one place. Replace overstuffed folders and spreadsheets with one simple system that organizes information by Schedule E categories.
 
Features
alt 	Software Sub Type 	  	Financial Management
alt 	Manufacturer 	  	Intuit, Inc
alt 	License Type 	  	Complete Product
alt 	Software Name 	  	Quicken Rental Property Manager v.2.0 - Complete Product
alt 	License Pricing 	  	Standard
alt 	Manufacturer Part Number 	  	296921
alt 	Manufacturer Website Address 	  	www.intuit.com
alt 	License Quantity 	  	1 User
alt 	Features 	  	

Rental property information all in one place:
# Organize your property information in one place
# Two steps and you&#039;&#039;re set up

Income and expense tracking for taxes:
# Save time retrieving financial information
# Capture deductions along the way
# Flag deductions you&#039;&#039;re not sure about
# Tax Reporting for Schedule E
# Exports to TurboTax Software

Rent tracking:
# Instantly see who has and hasn&#039;&#039;t paid rent this month.
# With the new Rent Center feature, you can record rent collected, partial payments, late fees, and also print rent receipts.
# Find everything you need to know at a glance. Access a tenant&#039;&#039;s rent payment history and balance due easily in the new Rent Center.

Tenant tracking:
# Now with just a click, you can find tenant contact information, lease terms, and security deposits.

Property performance:
# Get an instant snapshot of where your money is going
# Compare performance month-to-month
# Drill down for details
alt 	Product Type 	  	Software
alt 	Platform Support 	  	PC

Operating Systems:
# Windows 2000
# Windows XP

Hard Disk:
# 100 MB hard disk space

Memory:
# 64 MB RAM (128 MB recommended)

Optical Drive:
# CD-ROM or DVD drive required for installation (for CD-based installation)

Others:
# Browser: Internet Explorer IE 5 or higher
# Monitor: SVGA (800x600) with 16bit color (1024x768 with 16 bit color recommended)
# Internet Connection: Internet Connection: Internet functionality requires Internet access (56 Kbps or higher recommended)
# Sound: Optional
# Printer: Any printer supported by Windows 2000/XP
